objects.name: GameInstructions
objects.string: Arrow keys to move left and right, spacebar to jump

content.text: Arrow keys to move left and right, spacebar to jump

objects.name: TidyLvl1Line2
objects.string: ...belong anywhere. You must be lost. Out of place.

content.text: ...belong anywhere. You must be lost. Out of place.

objects.name: TidyLvl1Line3
objects.string: We must find your place, pixel.

content.text: We must find your place, pixel.

objects.name: TidyLvl1Line6
objects.string:
The Architects placed me in charge.
Everything must have order, harmony.

Let's see where to place you.

content.text:
The Architects placed me in charge.
Everything must have order, harmony.

Let's see where to place you.

objects.name: TidyLvl2Line3
objects.string:
Yours must have simply been miscalculated. 
I will run scans for a match.

content.text:
Yours must have simply been miscalculated. 
I will run scans for a match.

objects.name: TidyLvl2Line4
objects.string: You will be reintegrated into the environment shortly

content.text: You will be reintegrated into the environment shortly

objects.name: TidyLvl3Line2
objects.string: You have no index. You have no place.

content.text: You have no index. You have no place.

objects.name: TidyLvl3Line3
objects.string: Try to reach the rightmost platform.

content.text: Try to reach the rightmost platform.

objects.name: TidyLvl3Line4
objects.string:
Revising hypothesis.

Scans return no displaced pixels here, either.

content.text:
Revising hypothesis.

Scans return no displaced pixels here, either.

objects.name: TidyLvl4Line1
objects.string: Find and touch the pixel frameworks to repeat the sequence.

content.text: Find and touch the pixel frameworks to repeat the sequence.

objects.name: TidyLvl5Line2
objects.string: BALANCE is the system by which everything has meaning.

content.text: BALANCE is the system by which everything has meaning.

objects.name: TidyLvl5Line4
objects.string: Without BALANCE, I...you understand its importance, yes?

content.text: Without BALANCE, I...you understand its importance, yes?

objects.name: TidyLvl5Line3
objects.string:
These tests will hone your affinity in place of an index. 
To find you an environment.
A...home, to use a human term. The Architects said so.

content.text:
These tests will hone your affinity in place of an index. 
To find you an environment.
A...home, to use a human term. The Architects said so.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Entropy, VegeTato
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Flash
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Make an object flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
description: Make an object flash for a period of time so that it alternates between two different states.
Includes the ability to flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
After adding a behavior to an object, you **trigger the effect** by using the **Flash action**.
- Let players know they are invincible after being hit
- Catch player attention on the interface (for instance a "press start" text)

eventsFunctions.description: Color tint applied to an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Color tint applied to an object
eventsFunctions.name: ColorTint

events.comment: Return the color string for the tint applied to the object

eventsFunctions.description: Toggle color tint between the starting tint and a given value.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleColorTint

events.name: Note: This function cannot be "public" until it properly handles objects without a starting color tint variable (NULL)
Swap between the starting tint and the given value

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time so it alternates between visible and invisible.

parameters.description: Duration of the flashing, in seconds
parameters.longDescription: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped.

eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing visibility (blink) of an object.

eventsFunctions.description: the half period of the object (time the object is invisible).
